Back to Gabriel Fauré

Gabriel Fauré

Pavane in F-sharp minor, op. 50

1887 · N 100c

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Fauré wrote the pavane for orchestra with optional choir (N 100a). Two contemporary arrangements, for choir and piano (N 100b) and for solo piano (N 100c), are likely also by Fauré.

Recommended editions

  • Œuvres complètes (Bärenreiter) · VI/3 · BA 9471-01 · Œuvres pour piano á 2 mains III · ed. Jean-Pierre Bartoli
  • Bärenreiter · BA 11832 · ed. Jean-Pierre Bartoli

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5
